title: kaN paarayya
sahitya:
kaN pArayya kanA kArayya



anupallavi



naN pAr enadanbAgana panbAgavE paripUrNa krpaik



caraNam



mA karuNAmaya sAgaramAga mei jnAnAkara vAn indra taru nEr udAra

mOharamO timira divAkara

mOhana valI  manOhara shrIkara harapriya mudAkara jayakara kavi kunjaradAsa

para
